natural solution: Multiplying both sides by $(x - 4)(2x + 1),$ we get \[(2x + 3)(2x + 1) - (2x - 8)(x - 4) = (x - 4)(2x + 1).\]This simplifies to $31x - 25 = 0,$ so $x = \boxed{\frac{25}{31}}.$
